jd: From: Naveen M, Siri Info naveen.m@siriinfo.com Reply to: naveen.m@siriinfo.com HelloGreetings from Siri InfoSolutions…We have an immediate position, please find the below details… Role: Oracle EDQ DeveloperLocation: Chicago, IL Duration: 6+ months contract Job Description:• Hands on Exp On Oracle EDQ Tool• Implementing Oracle enterprise data quality tools for standardizing, cleansing, and enriching the master data management entities • Leading solution design, functional design, and technical design for Oracle enterprise data quality implementation. • Configuring and customizing Oracle enterprise data quality tools• Performing business requirement gathering• Documenting test plans, performing unit testing, integration testing, and system testing. • Programming bug fixes and data conversions, data integrations, and migrations.• Good understanding of Deduplication Matching processor in EDQ. • Should be able to use EDQ to do Data Standardization and Data Transformation using the EDQ processors available. • Need to understand MDM domain(Customer and Suppliers side). • Exp to build Data Quality Machine(DQM) with DQM columns to help business understand the Review status Match groups. • Able to convert the Business Matching rules to EDQ Matching rules involving Exact and Fuzzy Rules.• EDQ Java Script & SQL experience required • Experience on any EBS/ERP implementation on prem or Cloud Thanks & Regards,Naveen Miyyadi | Team Lead | Email: naveen.m@siriinfo.com | Phone : 732-797-9367Siri InfoSolutions Inc, 3 Ethel Rd, Suite # 302, Edison NJ 08817.
